Posts.Content: Mar 22, 2018 10:50PM PeaceK wrote: Hello,  I had a biopsy today following a 3D mammo that showed right distortion at 12 o'clock location with no calcifications.   I am a wreck and hoping it will be a radical scar etc.    The radiologist did not alleviate my concerns..  Did your radiologists tell you what they thought you had prior to the biopsy?  Thanks and good wishes for you  both.
